item.title: US announces 3 transfers out of Guantanamo in 24 hours
item.description: The U.S. Department of Defense on Wednesday announced the transfer of two detainees held at Guantanamo Bay.

item.title: Abundant Life Christian School shooting latest: Local schools report 'false threats'
item.description: Police are investigating the online footprint of 15-year-old Abundant Life Christian School shooting suspect Natalie Rupnow -- who went by Samantha.

item.title: 'Mass shooting' in Maryland: 1 dead, 9 wounded and vehicle in flames
item.description: Gunfire erupted in Towson, Maryland, on Tuesday evening, leaving 1 person dead and 9 others wounded, according to police.

item.title: Senate to vote on expanding Social Security payments for some teachers, firefighters
